description: To be stunned, dumbfounded, or completely confused by a situation or phenomenon happening right in front of you. Also written as 一脸懵, 一脸懵逼, 一脸懵b.

examples.chinese: 困懵逼了,差点儿一头扎进男厕所
examples.translation: I was so sleepy and confused that I almost rushed into the men's restroom.

examples.chinese: 这个视频看完绝对一脸懵逼
examples.translation: You will definitely be dumbfounded after watching this video.

examples.chinese: 我知道对方身份后,瞬间一脸懵逼
examples.translation: I was instantly dumbfounded after knowing the other party's identity.
